name: Dark Mozilla Add-ons (AMO)
description: A dark theme for Mozilla Add-ons (AMO). Note: This stylesheet is no longer updated here on userstyles.org and comments are not checked regularly. For future updates and issues, please, visit one of the following links: GitLab Codeberg UserStyles.world
